item.title: Pi morrigans specs shit
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

case 13879://Morr jav c.usingBow = true; c.usingMorrJavs = true; c.lastWeaponUsed = weapon; c.hitDelay = 3; c.startAnimation(806); c.projectileStage = 1; c.gfx100(getRangeStartGFX()); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); if (c.fightMode == 2) c.attackTimer--; if (c.playerIndex > 0) fireProjectilePlayer(); else if (c.npcIndex > 0) fireProjectileNpc(); c.specAccuracy = 2.7; c.specDamage = 1.4; c.forcedText = ""; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break;

Also do u know where my login method is. I followed this guide on how to make random yells in the server then they saidd add this smallt hing to the login method. but i have no clue were thats at
